attributes.action: Offer a 6 month tax relief for first time house buyers
attributes.background: First time buyers should have the option to activate a 6 month tax relief during the purchase of their first house. The relief given can support additional fees that are incurred when purchasing a house, such as solicitor or surveying fee’s.

rejection.details:
We understand that you would like tax relief to be offered to first time buyers but we aren't sure what tax or taxes you would like this to apply to.

You could start a new petition specifying what taxes buyers should be offered relief from. Or you may like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231124
